# Question 1 - How Many Breweries per State:
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

breweries_by_state <- breweries %>% group_by(State) %>% summarize(count = n())

breweries_by_state %>% ggplot(aes(x=reorder(State, -count), y = count)) +
  geom_col()


```
